pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Mixed Models for Qualitative Individual Differences // Test whether equality and order constraints hold for all individuals simultaneously by comparing Bayesian mixed models through Bayes factors. A tutorial style vignette and a quickstart guide are available, via vignette("manual", "quid"), and vignette("quickstart", "quid") respectively. See Haaf and Rouder (2017) doi:10.1037/met0000156; Haaf, Klaassen and Rouder (2019) doi:10.31234/osf.io/a4xu9; and Rouder Haaf (2021) doi:10.5334/joc.131.
